title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 29.3 - Agreement controlling and determinative
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 29.3 - Agreement controlling and determinative

State Regulations

The commissioner and the appropriate fiscal officer of the
county further agree that this agreement shall be exclusively controlling and
determinative of their respective authorities, duties and liabilities with
respect to the collection, administration, custody, remittal and enforcement of
the tax as imposed by the county in accordance with the local law. The
commissioner and the appropriate fiscal officer of the county further agree as
follows: (a) The duties of the
commissioner with respect to the collection, administration, custody, remittal
and enforcement of the tax are as contained in section
29.4
of this Part. (b) The appropriate fiscal officer of the
county shall have the sole duties and authority as are set forth in section
29.11
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
29.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
